website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for budget-conscious consumers looking for a smaller microwave, but it tends to be noisy.
pros: Users not only like the sleek and solid look of this unit, but many also praise it for its good price point, simple interface, and compact design
It also stands out for the easy "add 30 seconds" option
Its small size and value for the price make it a good option for small kitchens or those who want a smaller unit
cons: A few customers say the unit broke after a short time, and a few felt the construction could be improved
It also tends to be on the noisy side

customer_reviews.title: Best Microwave I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This was my first major appliance I've purchased online so I was a bit hesitant-there was no need! Microwave arrived well packed and in perfect working order. It's modern-sleek design looks amazing in my kitchen.. not too big, yet plenty of room inside to accommodate my large dinner plates. The heat settings are accurate, which is what it's all about. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne hurtig

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!  I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with trepidation as many reviewers noted "noisy, turntable not stable, door handle pulls micro when opening I noted NONE of this issues It does hum when cooking but is very soft Turntable is solid I like the door handle better as no fingerprints Very simple and easy to use microwave Does everything I need it to do I just love the red color!!!!
customer_reviews.author: South Bronx Kid

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy unless you want to press the exposed insides to start your microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Good microwave but within the first freaking month of using it the start/30 second button is already peeling off! I get that the start button is a "high traffic " area but damn 4 weeks ? I've pressed the button about 20 times and its already peeling and has exposed whats under the covering. Poor craftsmanship on this item unless i just got a faulty part. I would stay far away form this microwave unless you want it to look like garbage on your counter, there are plenty other microwaves out there that do not fall apart after a month. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bearface

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave looks nice, it's got a clean, sleek look. It does what it's supposed to do. But it doesn't seem very well made, the door is hard to open, and closes hard, and it is extraordinarily loud! Much louder than any other microwave I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this. This was received Dec 2, 2016 and it is making a horrendous scraping noise. Only 4 months and problems already.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Never have I dealt with a worse customer service situation - and the situation remains unresolved ...
customer_reviews.text: The microwave was purchased at the end of July and failed in October - just past Amazon's deadline for return and replace. It was a gift for my son for his new apartment. I have FOUGHT with Farberware for these last four months in an attempt to get a replacement. Never have I dealt with a worse customer service situation - and the situation remains unresolved as of today. Needless to say, I will NOT be purchasing Farberware products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: A microwave I don't mind looking at! Our old one was banished to the top of the fridge so it was out of sight, but it wasn't convenient to reach up. We got this one and are so happy. It's very attractive and adds character to our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Emm

customer_reviews.title: and the worst part is that there is no support
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than 5 months. Packed up, and the worst part is that there is no support. Farberware says that the electrical products such as Microwaves are now supported by Walmart. yes Walmart. I called Walmart and they claim that had I bought it at a Walmart store this product will have a two year warranty. Since I bought it on Amazon, they are not going to cover it. Walk away. Do not buy Farberware from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoking fumes
customer_reviews.text: After about one month of use, the microwave started producing smoke and making a funny fume smell from the inner panel. I'm afraid to use it for fear that my food will burn or the microwave will burn. It's brand new! I'm not sure what else to do besides replace it. With a different microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole R. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beware of failing light that can not be replaced
customer_reviews.text: A bit over a year into owning this (with no other issues) the light started to flicker like a disco when it was in use. It would glow steady, then not at all, then flicker with every use. Customer service (after countless emails and numerous phonecalls where you're on hold for 20+ minutes at a time) I found out these are not made to be able to replace the bulb. Really? After barely a year? Great. You don't realize how often you need that bulb until you don't have it. Never in my 40+ years of using many different microwaves has the light gone out in one. Hard pass on this one or any Farberware microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst microwave I have ever owned. Color is darker than pictured (1st disappointment). Light went out after 6 months (2nd disappointment). Impossible to change bulb unless you buy a special bit to get the cover off. Now it's started making this clunking sound (3rd disappointment). And finally - when I reached out to the Farberwear customer service - twice - support@edgecb.com, they never responded. It was the same when I called and tried to chat. 100% ZERO RESPONSE.
customer_reviews.author: 3POnR2

customer_reviews.title: Almost 3 years of use and no issues at all!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave (copper color) in June 2017; it is now January 2020. I am happy to report that I have had zero issues with this microwave, despite regular use. It's easy to clean, the plate is even and rotates well so nothing spills or gets hot spots, and the wattage/power cooks as expected. I really have no complaints, I just thought it should leave some feedback in case someone was on the fence!
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Microwave not working
customer_reviews.text: Just received my microwave on yesterday and the buttons doesn't. Hey cute microwave. Please resend me a brand new one that works. It's a shame because I just re did my kitchen in copper. What a bumer. One star for the color.😡😡 Update: I just received my replacement microwave and the buttons did not work on this one either. The microwave looked used. I called Faberware and they was no help at all. Then I called Amazon and the customer Rep told me that he was going to have this Copper Faberware microwave pulled which I see he did. I still sadden and disappointed that both microwaves did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Dixon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the microwave January 18,2020. I loved it at first. But here we are April 15,2020 and every time the microwave has been used for the last week it either makes a loud knocking sound or a high piched squeal. I have taken all the pieces out and made sure it was in there correctly but no change. If you want a microwave that only works properly for 3 months then this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Donner

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was NOT the best place to purchase products. Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microwave almost exactly a year ago, on December 6, 2017. Today is December 11, 2018 and it’s dead!! First the turntable stops turning and burns the food/plate in same spot every time. Now it’s completely dead! That’s ridiculous not even lasting a year! I normally love amazon. I recommend them to everyone especially the older generation that don’t normally use computers. I have told my elderly clients about amazons return policy, how you are protected when buying through amazon. Unfortunately buying this farberware microwave through amazon has turned me off from making future purchases. Stuck with a dead microwave, no protection. Even though it’s just 6 days shy of the year warranty. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sally C.

customer_reviews.title: Could have burned my house down.
customer_reviews.text: After 11 lovely months, the interior side panel wiring started sparking and almost caught fire during use. I was standing next to the microwave at the time and turned it off as the sparks started to catch fire. There was only a glass container in the oven at the time. I'm a Gen X'er and we know the mircowaving laws of the land. I would highly recommend to NOT buy this. The last microwave I owed lasted for 30+ years. This thing is a serious risk. If you want to ignore this review, it's also a bit of a pain in the ass to use as well but looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Priode

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first I got it was spotted on top of door. Amazon sent me another one and it very good but I think this one getting spotted on the door also. It's too loud but I like it because its red it matches my kitchen. If I still continue to see it gets spots on it I will let the know.
customer_reviews.author: ALETHIA

customer_reviews.title: Need to change light bulb
customer_reviews.text: After one month, the interior light started blinking, going off, coming back on, going dim. I CAN'T FIND ANY INFO ON HOW TO ACCESS THIS BULB. I can't return it, as I printed a return label and I ran out of time for returns. (long story) Now I'm stuck with it. With the dark gray interior (grrrrrrr) it is hard to see the contents. PLEASE HELP.
customer_reviews.author: dottiebunky

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: The unit I replaced was much smaller and much louder. I was impressed with the quieter technology. I don't know why I expected a full copper microwave, but it is only around the face. Still though, it's a nice accent in my kitchen. The operation of this unit couldn't be simpler and the power is perfect for the size. I'm not a fan of the gray interior, but overall, I am happy with this unit. Lastly, when lit, you can easily see inside the unit as your food cooks (major plus).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Mostly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 2nd, 2018 ..... died a smoking death on January 27th, 2020. Lived a short life of 1 year and 10 months roughly. Kinda expected more than that. Got 20 years out of a Goldstar purchased in the 80s and 6 years out of our recent Kenmore. We purchased this unit for my wife's 78 year old mother who used it infrequently. It sat in free space on a counter top with plenty of ventilation space on all sides. So much for "off-brands".
customer_reviews.author: Original Vidiot

customer_reviews.title: Quite noisy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this machine because it will fit on a deep windowsill in our kitchen given its relatively small exterior size. However, it is noisier than any microwave we've owned. There's a loud droning sound when first heating an item. This decreases somewhat during the heating process. Even more strange, the rotating platform makes loud clicking noises as it revolves; the sound resembles a train traveling down a train track. It seems to heat well enough, which I suppose is the whole point, but do be aware of the noise this machine makes. If you have reflective acoustics in your kitchen, as we do, this may be problematic for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave March 2019, and it is already showing visible wear and tear. The buttons are peeling. Also today I cam home to it running on its own, only stopping when I opened the door, not buttons would work. I unplugged it, and when I re plugged it in, it continued to run on it's own. We owned it less then a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, elegant, with a good range of options. It lacked the reheating option but soon enough i got the hang of the settings. The amazing thing is that it cooks food evenly. I bought the largest size and it still fit snuggly on my counter with the many other appliances.
customer_reviews.author: JoelleW

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay on.
customer_reviews.text: About six months after purchasing this microwave, it started having issues with staying on and finishing cooking all the way through the set time. Sometimes it will work great for a few days, then, whenever a button is pressed to microwave something, it just shuts off. I would not recommend this product. I purchased this product because of its multiple positive reviews, but it has not been a positive experience for me.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Wick, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fire!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for two weeks and it does take a bit longer to cook food than what I’m used to using. I put a larger baked potato in the oven tonight and I said the time cook for five minutes and before the timer went off the whole apartment was full of smoke and I open the door of the microwave and the potato was on fire and completely charred there was no paper nothing in there I just put it on that plate or turntable. Obviously, that’s not supposed to happen after two weeks. Returning to Kohl’s tomorrow. I should’ve listened to my instinct told me not to get Farberware because they’re not noted for their microwaves.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Instead and inspected INCORRECTLY
customer_reviews.text: After I Unpacked this item, I Found: 1-a major scratch, right on the front door. 2-it was missing two pieces, for the footings. 3-the door handle was installed upside down. How can I trust that the electrical parts inside, where installed and inspected correctly. If they can’t get the obvious outside parts, installed and inspected correctly, how can I trust, they got the inside electrical Installed and inspected correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Dono

customer_reviews.title: Key Pad wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.text: We received it today. The key pad numbers would not work. It would heat a cup of water on +30 sec. but key pad did not work. Sending it back. It also sounds very tinny when you shut the door. There is no button to open the door. You yank on the door to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Csfla400

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Heating
customer_reviews.text: I returned the oven because of uneven heating. Other remarks... The oven is quiet (compared to my very old microwave oven.) The buttons are difficult to read. . . a flashlight helps. I'd like to be able to kill the beeper. The best solution I've come up with is to open the door just before time's up. But, that means you have to be at the oven when time is about to run out. "Cancelling" after you open the door will clear the remaining second(s) but will cause a single beep.
customer_reviews.author: Compupix

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly noisy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a as a backup and replacement. It works well enough. But has two very annoying features. 1. The noise level is incredibly bad. It may be a bad unit, or it may be the way it comes. We'll decide shortly whether or not to return it (something we seldom do). 2. When the "done" ding goes off and you open the microwave door, it keeps dinging for the full five times. It should cut off when the door is opened. It probably makes more sense to pay $20 more for the competing low end Toshiba model from Amazon. We chose this Farberware model because it had a week shorter delivery date, and our microwave oven ain't working.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rider

customer_reviews.title: Broken After A Few Months... Can't Find Contact Info For Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few months ago - ALREADY BROKEN. The microwave stops microwaving after about 45 seconds, shuts off, and trips the breaker. We are using a 20 amp circuit. We have moved this to other 20 amp circuits. It is the microwave. I have been trying to contact the manufacturer, as this is supposed to have a 1 year warranty. I cannot find any information on how to contact them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: A week after use, like another review the front panel plastic showed a hole. Twice since I've been using it there has been a shut down. I can only assume there is a thermal fuse or breaker that opens. After 10-15 minutes the circuit completes again. When it shuts down, no lights,operation, or display. Both times this happened after heating two items in a row. The interior light is too dim. Very hard to see inside. Who thought dark gray was a good color? Not enough contrast on the panel. Very difficult to see the controls. I'll use it till it quits totally, but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Placek

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 12 year-old microwave with this one. It's very sleek and attractive and doesn't have that push button open/close that tends to stick after a while and has the revolving platter with enough wattage to really cook and not just heat up food. All the fast time buttons including 30-seconds are here and it looks great in my kitchen. No issues at all and it shipped quickly - just 3 days with Prime on a late night weekend order. Added feature that my old one didn't have - I get to choose between defrost by weight or by time. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: hallgirl

customer_reviews.title: I love the express buttons. Press "1" for 1 minute, "2" for 2 minutes, and so forth.
customer_reviews.text: Super sleek, powerful microwave at 1000 watts. Having the express buttons was an important factor in making my purchase: Press "1" for 1 minute, "2" for 2 minutes, and so forth. Pressing "Start" will add an additional 30 seconds if needed. I got one for me and one for my boyfriend's mother. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carol J.

customer_reviews.title: 0 Stars for Durability, Decent Microwave While it Lasts
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with 1 or 2 stars for this review. It has been less than 3 years since I purchased this microwave and like some other reviews, I am now having to replace it because of rust issues on the interior. The entire top has bubbling paint and rust now to the point where flakes are falling onto anything that gets microwaved. I hadn't noticed it until recently but to be this bad the problem has to have been going on for a while. The microwave does its job as expected - but rusting on the inside after probably a year and a half or two? Absolutely unacceptable. I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mickprops

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: product sipped quickly and was just as it was pictured. Microwave gives you 5 beeps letting you know its finished. I do not find the beeps to be any louder than other microwaves I have owned. love the red color. the inside is gray instead of the traditional white. after using now or about a week I like the gray inside much better than whit now that I am use to it. for the money this is a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: r.m. texas

customer_reviews.title: Noisy. Look at themes in the 1* reviews! Beware
customer_reviews.text: Noisy! It sounded like my previous microwave that only made this much noise as it died. I called customer support and they just suggested it was fine unless I heard other noises. If I ran it on less than 100% power, the loud sound stopped and started. Beware... Before buying this unit, please notice the consistency & repetition of several concerns raised in these one star reviews & the descriptions of customer service responses. It is astonishing! This is not a reliable product. I have returned my unit to amazon. The alternative unit that I also bought through Amazon is much quieter. Frankly, I think Amazon ought to stop selling this particular model.
customer_reviews.author: Tazz3L

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good....
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this oven....the copper color on the front is attractive and the light inside illuminates the dark grey interior quite well. I tested it out with a frozen breakfast bowl....heated the food perfectly. I have read that some find it loud. When I first started it, it DID sound loud...but only for a second or 2, but then the sound died down, replaced by an acceptable humming which was not loud. If I find any problems with the unit, I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: smr61754

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but overheats very easily!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave has an automatic shut off function for when it over heats so it doesn't burn the house down. That's great! Except it over heats ALL THE TIME. I try microwaving two bags of steamed veggies and this thing throws in the towel. I gave it two stars for the quantity of frozen veggies it can microwave before it gets dramatic and gives up. On the plus side, it looks great in the kitchen! And the quick buttons are cool.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working abruptly.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you are looking for reliability. I bought this exactly 7 months ago. The minute I was done paying for it it just stopped in the middle of a food warming. Checked all sockets removed it and tested in other outlets no dice. Thoroughly disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: SEEMIN S AHMED

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Microwave worked great at first, seemed to heat evenly and quickly. After a year or so it developed a slight electrical wine when plugged in but not running. About six months later, mid way though heating food, it started to smell strongly of burnt plastic and fried electronics and was immediately unplugged. The food inside still smelled fine so we knew the microwave itself had given up. I would not recommend this unit but still gave it 2 starts because it worked well before it completely gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a several months but now only one side of the food is getting warmed up. I never knew that could possibly happen, but guess what, it's actually happening every single time. Amazon should email me a prepaid shipping label and have a free pickup as I'm a senior citizen and will already have hard time packing it in a box. This is the last time that I'll order "Farberware" brands
customer_reviews.author: Orly

customer_reviews.title: Makes a loud noise and light inside doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product, the light inside didn't work properly. It flickers sometimes but mostly just doesn't come on at all. Seems as if the bulb wasn't screwed in all the way, but it's not accessible to fix. Figured I could live with that so I didn't return it. It makes a horrible squealing noise as the plate turns inside. Both my husband and I looked at it, nothing seems to be out of place for it to be making this noise. Does heat well, so that's a plus but not worth not having a light and hearing the loud squeal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing good to say about this microwave. It is NOTHING like they describe on the website. It's noisy. Clunky. You have microwave the food twice as long as you should to get it partially where it needs to be. I put in for a return immediately. False advertising and just a bad purchase for a microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Positively Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is loud when in use and after only 2 weeks the inside light started flickering and then went out.
customer_reviews.author: FSM Media

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking microwave and I really wanted to like it. I have had Farberware pots and pans since my Wedding shower 57 years ago. As soon as we tried to use it, it was so loud it sounded dangerous and could be heard across the house. I wonder if it could have been that parts were loosened in transit. It was sent in just the original manufacturer's box and it was a little dented on the corners and I felt the packing could have been better. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Works great - place item on top to stop metal vibration
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Before I purchased I read lots of comments about noisy and loud. The one we received is no louder than the ones we have had in the past. I did realize the sheet metal vibration at first. Without bents to strengthen thin sheets of metal they will vibrate. We placed a basket of hot pads on top and solved the top vibration.
customer_reviews.author: Woodchuck

customer_reviews.title: Heats your food, not your plate!
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. The finish is very nice and clean. It heats my food more than my plate! It's so weirdo for me that this actually happens since every other microwave ive had would heat the plate to the point of a burning touch but my food would be super cold! Im very glad i chose this microwave and i am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great in my kitchen and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: All in all my son and I are very happy with our new fancy red microwave. It replaced microwave that my housemate used without covering food. It had burned the top of the microwave. It is louder than the other microwave but not to the point of sending it back. I like the interior better it’s more than just a flat white interior. All in all we very much enjoyed this microwave and are happy with her purchase. It looks really good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Cloyd

customer_reviews.title: Died after 9 month
customer_reviews.text: well as title says died after 9 month, orange sparkles, burned food. It's okay microwave when it's working but overall pretty average and pretty loud. 9 month ago it was top of the category here or amazon and in couple of review websites.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Very LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this microwave looks aesthetically but don’t like the front panel being “blurred out” making it to where you can’t see in clearly. Also, you should know that this microwave is LOUD! We have a newborn and even with her being in the back of the house the sound of the buttons, beeping, and especially the opening/shutting of the microwave disrupt her sleep. Wish I had listened to the reviews. Beware of noise level, but it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Can choose own cook time.
customer_reviews.text: Rally nice looking, matches my stove, not very loud. It also has a button for the option to select your cook time. My last microwave wouldn't let you set your own cook time you had to use the quick buttons unless you were defrosting something, I actually noticed it's a common thing in any microwave under 100$ so I was excited this one lets me select my time while also having the quick buttons.
customer_reviews.author: brandie

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Noisy but Holds Up 2 Years Later
customer_reviews.text: I've had this microwave for about two years now and it has served me very well! A few months ago my concern was that the buttons were bubbling a little, but it turned out there was a slim clear sheet of plastic over them that I was able to remove, no more bubbling! My main issue is the noise. It can hum pretty loudly sometimes. But it heats food well and has many useful settings. I would likely buy this microwave again if this one broke a few years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awful microwave
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Coating on the inside burned and peeled off in chunks after 6 months. Cannot use the timer and cook something at the same time. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but noisy microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Superfast Delivery! I LOVE it-super nice item and price! I paid less than $100-free prime shipping. I got the black with stainless steel-1000 watts. Pretty big size-plenty of room inside -can hold a 12" dinner plate. Has glass turntable that revolves-i'm mentioning that because the only flaw is the Noise when oven is on-it is noisy! It seemed to make more noise when the turntable was revolving so i removed the ring and the little turn knob that holds the turntable. Noise aside-its a really nice looking microwave and it cooks faster than my other microwaves ever did.
customer_reviews.author: thriftykittycat

customer_reviews.title: Very loud humming
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice microwave, except for the loud humming noise, which is very annoying, borderline obnoxious. Can't recommend it just because it is too loud. Note to Farberware - it's 2019! Can't you make it quieter????
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: We have been very pleased with Amazon but it looks like we’ve found the ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased back in November and had issues with the Time Cook and Power buttons but thought it was a setting issue that was reseting itself. We have contacted the manufacturer and they say it is a faulty unit but since we purchased through Amazon we would need to contact them. We contact Amazon and of course it’s just outside of the return window and they say we have to contact the manufacturer. We have been very pleased with Amazon but it looks like we’ve found the downside. We’re now stuck with a microwave that does not work because it was purchased through Amazon. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully getting a replacement/ using the warrantee/insurance will not be overly tedious. May just be a bad model but seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this microwave a total of 10 times, at most, and it completely broke. It appears to be an electrical issue. It was very loud from the beginning, which I don't recollect reading in the reviews. I did get the Asurion insurance on this one, which I really never do, possibly because I read something that tipped me off. Hopefully getting a replacement/ using the warrantee/insurance will not be overly tedious. May just be a bad model but seems very odd.
customer_reviews.author: HAKUNIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous piece of junk.... DO NOT BUY THIS MICROWAVE.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MICROWAVE !!!! Dangerously defective right out of the box. Hit any timer setting (30sec, or one of the 1-6 minute fast settings) and it counts down to a certain point, the timer stops counting, but it keeps right on cooking !! The stop button WILL NOT STOP IT. Only opening the door stops it. So it you set it and walk away, have a fire extinguisher handy.....you're gonna need it.
customer_reviews.author: Tn_Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good microwave. I haven't had a single problem come up with it. I usually don't care for red appliances, but it's actually got a pretty red color. I was also pleased with how quickly this was delivered to me, also the workers that got it to me took great care in handling it, the box and product had no sign of damage. It actually cooks everything through too! My last microwave was either still frozen in the middle, or burned. Great product, I do recommend if you're in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Perkey

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave at first. Stopped working after a year out of the blue for no good reason. Can’t decide whether to try to fix it or just toss it and buy a new one, but not sure I’d want to buy this one again if the next one does the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wont run more than 10 min. At a time. Terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: snazzy looking, cooks fine; turntable shoddy
customer_reviews.text: Photo shows color and finish accurately. Cooking is fine. Controls are intuitive. Manual clear. HOWEVER, the turntable mechanism is very cheap, and the tray often gets off track, causing it to wobble and make a horrid noise! Also, I'd be concerned about a tipping hazard if cooking an almost-full bowl of liquid. It's a shame they couldn't have spent another, what?, $3 to make a better "track"! I'm wondering if the track will break before or just after the warranty period...
customer_reviews.author: O.M.

customer_reviews.title: One minor annoyance
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this purchase. Much more powerful than my old microwave so that took some adjusting on my part. I don’t find it loud and I don’t have an issue with opening it. My one small complaint is that when it’s beeping to indicate it’s ready, I usually open it right away to get the beeping to stop, but this one just continues doing the 5-6 beeps regardless... I’ve also tried pushing the cancel button to put an early stop to the beeping and that didn’t work either :/
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: CRASHING INTRODUCTION....
customer_reviews.text: I was attracted to this microwave by the red trim, an unusual feature which tones in with my kitchen. It arrived this evening and I unpacked it, read the instructions and set it up and setting the time. When dinner-time came, I was having some leftovers and placed the plate of food into the microwave. I set it on one minute and pressed start!! There was a loud grinding noise, the interior light started to flash, the digital clock started to jump numbers, and then stopped. That was the beginning and end of my brand new microwave!!??
customer_reviews.author: Plutoman46

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work when I received it. Manufacturer said it was defective. When I plugged it in, it would automatically turn on and I couldn't turn it off. None of the buttons worked. Had to return it and get a new microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works Well so Far
customer_reviews.text: On the positive I really like the timer that you can use when you are not using the microwave. It is not as simple to operate as other microwaves I have used. Everytime you use it you must also put in an entry for power--i.e. what percentage of power you will use 100%, 50%, etc. Most of the time one will use 100% and adjust the time. This extra step is a bit unnecessary, IMHO. Also it looks very basic--a big box with some trimming.. Not as beautiful as my 6-year old retro red that just died. But loved the price as I bought it on Amazon prime day.
customer_reviews.author: BLKSUPERIOR

customer_reviews.title: Something was wrong with this unit
customer_reviews.text: Microwave was extremely loud and was returned to Amazon immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Missing many modern day features most microwave have. Doesnt cook very well. Always uneven heating and inconsistent cook times. Feels and looks alot cheaper then advertised as well. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 3k

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The product started out well when I purchased it in Dec. 2017. It is currently 11 days short of being 3 months old. In the beginning it heated well, boiled water in about a minute and a half. Now, the same cup of water takes about 4 minutes to boil. A frozen sandwich took about a minute and thirty seconds. Now, about 3.5 to 4 minutes. It seems like the power has diminished considerably. My old 800 watt microwave performs better than this 1000 watt unit does.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holiday

customer_reviews.title: For the price you are going to have a hard time finding a better microwave. Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Darn thing is a T.A.R.D.I.S. so much bigger on the inside. For the price you are going to have a hard time finding a better microwave. Powerful, big inside, small outside. Also, this may seem random, but the rotating tray inside stays on its tracks. Always happy when that happens.
customer_reviews.author: adam whittington

customer_reviews.title: What a Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: It's only 2 months old and it's shutting off as soon as it's turned on. Amazon won't replace or return it since it's outside of the 30 days. I've tried calling the manufacturer and I've called about 10 different numbers and every one is either disconnected or "I'm sorry we don't handle that" and then they transfer me to someone who says "I'm sorry we don't handle that". What a waste of money - please don't do what I did!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, dangerous product. Bad company.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Had it in my office for 17 months. Very limited use. Smoke started pouring out of it. Farberware Manufacturer takes no responsibility for it and will do nothing even though they admit a “quality” product would last many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This was a great microwave I used it every single day for sterilizing my baby bottles and for food. Suddenly it stopped working today(October 2018). Purchased it on July 2018. Now I'll have to go buy another one. Not sure if there is a manufacturers warranty but its probably going to be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Custome

customer_reviews.title: Love my red microwave!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the red one for about a week and it looks gorgeous in my kitchen and works great so far. It seems sturdy and I really appreciate the dark grey interior after having so many white ones that show every bit of spatter, plus it looks sleek. The light is bright enough that I can clearly see what's going on inside. I don't have any complaints about the sound level. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: This runs hot
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old 1000 watt microwave with this one. I love the interior color and it runs great, it's just hotter than my previous one. I noticed when popping corn with my microwave popper the time is less that before. Some of the prepared frozen entrees take less time to cook, also.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C77

customer_reviews.title: it going to Explode! Turn it off!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. I have had this for just at 6 months and is making all kinds of sounds and I believe it is going to explode! Do not waste your money. Get another brand cause this one sucks! I have wasted 100 bucks on a crappy product. Not worth it. Move on.....next.
customer_reviews.author: flash 41

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Decent
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an older similar sized and power unit that got all rusty on the inside. The controls are similar to what I'm used to, it does everything I want a microwave to do, and it's not unattractive or difficult to clean and fits a large plate for heating up large plates of stuff... I dunno if it's the best thing in the world, but it works nice and looks nice and isn't hard to use...
customer_reviews.author: Driver

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my Hamilton Beach of 7 years died. It has a lot of the same features which I liked - the one push for 30 seconds of cooking. I like the size and turntable. Ease of cleaning. And in my all white kitchen I enjoyed getting a red microwave. My only concern was that it made a louder hum that what I had been used to. But that seems to be normal for this Farberware microwave. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret White

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for home when a previous, older microwave broke down, and when looking for one for my office, I bought another - based on the quality, operation, and price. Quiet operation, easy to operate and clean, and at 1,000 watts, does a great job heating and reheating.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This microwave lasted 13 month!!!! Just enough time to the warranty to expire. It started to make vibrating noises and smelled like burning plastic. It was a $106.99 piece of junk. I just threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: lucy armstrong

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Im very disappointed in this unit. I bought it to replace an existing farberware microwave that finally failed and couldnt be more in shock about how lousy this model is. It looks nice, but when its running it sounds absolutely horrible, almost as if its going to explode. Even the light makes a huming noise when the door is open and the unit isnt running. Id return it, but stupid me threw out the box before actually using it. Its complete junk and I cant believe I wasted my money on it
customer_reviews.author: Ray H

customer_reviews.title: It is not working in LESS THAN 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This WAA a good product. I have owned it for less than 6 months. It is making weird noises and now sparking!!! Basically garbage. AND OF COURSE!! Missed the RETURN WINDOW LESSON: only buy these larger products at stores .... they will refund you or at least issue a store credit. I do not DO NOT recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: I got it in red and love it. Works great - a little noisy
customer_reviews.text: This micro oven was exactly what I was looking for. I got it in red and love it. Works great - a little noisy, but not enough to worry about. I do not have a lot of room for a microwave, but this fits my counter perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reida Aston

customer_reviews.title: Nice, handy, but has a trumpet sound!
customer_reviews.text: Everything's good but the sound it SOOOOO loud. When it finishes cooking, it is like a TRUMPET, blowing four times to the whole world: "OH YES, I'M DONE". I'm a nocturnal person and sometimes I have a snack at 2am, 3am or even later. That's not the most nice thing to worry will I awake the whole neighborhood by heating something in this microwave. There should be an option to reduce the sound or to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Marion

customer_reviews.title: Product was a hazard. Smoking after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product in January. A few weeks after receiving it it started making a hissing sound. The sound was annoying, but still worked. My daughter went to use it yesterday and it started smoking. I immediately unplugged it. Glad i was home when this happened. This product should have lasted longer than 3 months and was a hazzard. Unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Favro

customer_reviews.title: 1 Cubic Foot Microwave Oven is a great buy. The product is good looking and works ...
customer_reviews.text: Faberware Classic FMO11AHTBKB 1.1 Cubic Foot Microwave Oven is a great buy. The product is good looking and works very well. The reason that I didn`t give it a five star review is that you need to yank the handle to open it up. My old one had a lever which made it much easier to open up. I love the inside light too. It runs a bit noisier than my old one but that doesn`t bother me. All in all, I would recommend the microwave oven to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karin L. Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I can't even say how much I love this beautiful microwave! It functions well. I love the dark grey inside instead of the yucky white. Its large enough for a full plate. I love that the power is labeled in the opening so you never have to wonder. Very nice appliance.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonG

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT BULB IRREPLACEABLE
customer_reviews.text: Everything works good on the microwave except the bulb which went out after a little over a month of owning it. I didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning it so I tried to change it myself which required opening it only to find out it’s irreplaceable. Not a deal breaker but definitely an inconvenience having no light.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: piece of juk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 days then started going by itself with no control over the number board. Unplug it and plug back in and it starts by itself. Fire hazard, Going hack
customer_reviews.author: Louise Alt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price with 1000 watts and great features!
customer_reviews.text: I love the 1000 watts of power it supplies and the one button start. Just push 1 through 6 and it starts cooking your meal from 1 to 6 minutes. Adding 30 seconds is just another one button push. The only downfall that I can see is once the time is up, it beeps, however if you forget that the food is ready, the microwave doesn't beep again reminding you to come get your food. It's not a critical flaw, it's just something that all my other microwaves did. They kept beeping every 60 seconds after the food was done, reminding me to come get my food.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Essing

customer_reviews.title: A good inexpensive microwave
customer_reviews.text: A good inexpensive microwave. 1000W is definitely less power than 1100W, so don't be surprised by that. It tends to make varying amounts of noise while running. I had to return the first one delivered, because the "high variant" noise was insufferably loud. The second one that I received is okay. It won't win any awards for being quiet, but it's fine. I would recommend this as a quality budget purchase; it's compact, and fits well on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jones II

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It is surprisingly hard to find an affordable, stainless steel countertop microwave with a handle. However, I’m very happy with this microwave and I’ve had it for a year now. I absolutely hate microwaves that open with a push button so I’m really glad this has a handle- and the feet are sturdy enough that the microwave won’t slide when you pull the handle to open it. I also realllllly love the dark gray interior because it hides small messes (temporarily of course).
customer_reviews.author: TeamB509

customer_reviews.title: Noise Noise Noise
customer_reviews.text: In the process of returning- it’s the LOUDEST microwave ever. I didn’t check the reviews and should have Every other review was about the horrible loud noises it makes The look of it is great very trendy but ...
customer_reviews.author: NELMIE BROWN

customer_reviews.title: the color choice only impacts door trim. Not the whole outside which is black.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly nice microwave oven. Mine is relatively quiet. Seems to operate as it should. My main gripe is... supposed to be stainless finish. The only thing that is stainless is the front face door trim. The rest is all black. Not what I wanted. It appears the only thing in the color choices that changes is the door trim. Very deceptive description.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good but loud
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is good for doing its job. It indeed make subtle but weird loud hardworking noise that I never hear from other microwave. And the door is like a pissed girlfriend shutting door on you. But it’s really ok, I don’t mind. I think it does a better job than my last whirlpool microwave in terms of heating and defrost.
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Liu

customer_reviews.title: Keypad started to bubble a month after we received microwave
customer_reviews.text: The microwave itself works fine but the keypad started to bubble a month after we got it. Might be a fluke but we are returning it and purchasing an entirely different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Nice - Heats fast easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave. It looks nice on the counter and doesn't take up a lot of space. It easily holds a normal dinner plate and heats food fast, for example those birds eye microwave veggies normally say 4:30min - 6Min i normally heat for 5Min and they are hot all the way through. Its simple enough for my 11yr old and 8yr old to use. Cleaning the inside is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Light died in less than two years
customer_reviews.text: After about a year and a half, the light flickered and then died. There's no way to fix the light or replace the bulb in the manual. Otherwise, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: E's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Decent Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I realized after buying this that it's the exact same model that's in the break room at my work, so I'm already familiar with its workings. Works great. I like the one-touch timed settings and the ability to add 30 seconds while it's running. Can't think of any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is so noisy. It is on the first floor and I can hear it running on my third floor. Part of the problem is that the entire thing vibrates while on but even with a rubber mat underneath it makes a lot of noise. The plate jerks as it rotates. If I hadn't broken down the box for recycling, I would have sent it back. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Seawoman

product_meta.title: Farberware 1.1 Cu. Ft. Stainless Steel Countertop Microwave Oven With 6 Cooking Programs, LED Lighting, 1000 Watts
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelThe Farberware classic microwave delivers power, style and convenience with a sleek design to complement your kitchen. Features include 10 power levels and a memory function that stores and recalls your preferred cooking settings. The Farberware classic offers an easy to operate digital interface with 1-6 minute express cook buttons, time or weight based defrost controls, +30-Seconds control, as well as six pre-programmed cooking functions for popcorn, pizza, a dinner plate and more. Multi-stage cooking means that you can set the power level to adjust during the cooking cycle for perfect results without interruption. The LED display provides a clock and kitchen timer. With a generous 1. 1 Cubic foot cooking Capacity, 1000 watts of power, and a rotating turntable, the Farberware classic is the perfect multi-tasker for your kitchen.
feature_bullets: Spacious & stylish: With 1. 1-Cu. feet Of cooking capacity, a sleek Stainless Steel exterior and Stainless Steel interior and 10 power levels, this counter top microwave delivers power, style, and convenience to any kitchen
Six cooking programs: Auto cooking programs (popcorn, potato, pizza, frozen vegetable, dinner plate) provide convenient control and avoid guesswork
Express cooking: Cook your leftovers with just a touch of a button by touching the number pad (1 through 6 minutes)
Digital clock: Easy-to-read LED display lights up the digital clock and highlights each cooking setting
Child lock: Lock the control panel using the child safety lock option to prevent accidental use or access by children
Defrost: For all your frozen foods, defrost by time or weight so you can enjoy more flavorful foods
Glass turntable: Large 12.5-Inch glass turntable allows for even cooking and is removable for easy clean up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,036 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
